note.p: Botanist. Son of John Gilbert and Hannah Baker. Assistant in department of botany, second class, 1887; first class, 1903; assistant keeper, 1921–24.
Archives catalogue of the Natural History Museum, (nhm.ac.uk/research-curation/library/archives/catalogue, accessed 16 June 2017)
